item.title: References
item.description: Philosophy and social sciences Essays by Michel de Montaigne For a New Liberty: The Libertarian Manifesto by Murray N. Rothbard - good introduction into Libertarianism with a lot of thoroughly written examples. Really suggest to read it if you want to see how economical extreme looks like if it is based on private property as a “base axiom”. Investing The Bogleheads' Guide to Investing by by Taylor Larimore - first book on investing recommended in Reddit’s r/personalfinance/.
